PAYE.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a system for paying tax in which tax is taken from workers’ wages and paid directly to the government
PAYE.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: pay as you earn; a system for paying tax used in Britain and some other countries in which tax is taken off workers’ wages and paid directly to the government
PAYE.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Employees whose tax is deducted at source under PAYE are not sent an income tax return.
